/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by tall apartment buildings, their beige facades standing out against the clear blue sky. The buildings are adorned with balconies and windows, adding architectural interest to the scene. Parked cars line the side of the street, hinting at the daily life and activity in this urban setting. In the distance, trees can be seen, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the details of the buildings and the street.
